item.title: Jimmy Carter’s journey home: Mapping the funeral plans for the coming days
item.description: Locations where official events will take place before President Carter is laid to rest in his hometown.

item.title: Chief Justice Roberts warns of threats to judges in year-end report
item.description: Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. presented an annual year-end report on the state of the judiciary.

item.title: Pentagon’s 9/11 plea deals can proceed, appeals court rules
item.description: The U.S. government earlier this year entered into the plea agreements with Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and two other 9/11 suspects, sparing them the death...

item.title: U.S. imposes Russia, Iran sanctions over attempted election interference
item.description: The Treasury Department announced new sanctions on Iranian and Russian entities accused of trying to interfere with the 2024 U.S. elections.

item.title: Sen. Kevin Cramer’s adult son sentenced to 28 years in prison
item.description: Ian Cramer led law enforcement in North Dakota on a high-speed chase, crashing into a vehicle and killing a sheriff’s deputy.
